com.navis.framework.portal.context.server

Interface ILifecycleService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLifecycleService, ApplicationHealthLifecycleService, CacheLifecycleService, ClusterNodeLifecycleService, ESBLifecycleService, IlogInitLifecycleService, InitialFrameworkLifecycleService, JobStepConfigurationLifecycleService, MbeanLifecycleService, NetworkNodeLifecycleService, NodeLifecycleService, PersistenceLifecycleService, ProblemSolutionLifecycleService, QuartzLifecycleService, RestWebServiceLifecycleService, SecurityLifecycleService, WorkflowLifecycleService, XpsMessageContextLifecycleService, YardCacheLifecycleService

    public interface ILifecycleService
    We eventually want to go to a OSGi type model but for now we have our own services.

    Potential enhancements

    1. Add more components with a restart

    2. we could specify which server mode the service applies to.

    Author:
    Heji Kim, Apr 20, 2009

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean abortOnInitError()
      Will cause the application to abort.
      void dispose(IServerConfig inConfig)
      Called during a shutdown of an application.
      boolean hasInitialized()
      To determine whether a service has already been initialized.
      void initialize(IServerConfig inConfig)
      Caller must account for Throwable.
      void setInitialized(boolean inInitialized)
      Set the status of the service initialization.

    • Method Detail

      • abortOnInitError

        boolean abortOnInitError()
        Will cause the application to abort. Note we don't bother during shutdown since anything can happen in shutdown.
        Returns:
        true if lifecycle service is aborted during initialization error; false, to ignore initialization error and continue

      • initialize

        void initialize(IServerConfig inConfig)
        Caller must account for Throwable. Decided not to have throw a checked exception since caller will still have to catch throwable.
        Parameters:
        inConfig - server configuration

      • hasInitialized

        boolean hasInitialized()
        To determine whether a service has already been initialized. This method is useful for testing purposes.
        Returns:
        true if service has already been initialized; false, otherwise.

      • setInitialized

        void setInitialized(boolean inInitialized)
        Set the status of the service initialization. Services are not reentrant, so this flag should only be set once.
        Parameters:
        inInitialized - true, if service has been initialized; false, otherwise.

      • dispose

        void dispose(IServerConfig inConfig)
        Called during a shutdown of an application.
        Parameters:
        inConfig - server configuration
